posts.post: Trasportare le tue merci in sicurezza è la nostra priorità. Wings to Australia si affida esclusivamente alle mani dei nostri Esperti di Freight Forwarding lungo l’intero percorso della spedizione.Per saperne di più: https://lnkd.in/dtpPuyuthashtag#DHL hashtag#DHLGlobalForwarding hashtag#Logistics hashtag#Transportation hashtag#AirFreightSolutions hashtag#SupplyChain hashtag#AFR

Spedire in Australia può essere molto costoso. La soluzione Wings to Australia ti aiuta a consegnare le tue merci in modo veloce ed economico.Per saperne di più: https://lnkd.in/dtpPuyuthashtag#DHL hashtag#DHLGlobalForwarding hashtag#Logistics hashtag#Transportation hashtag#AirFreightSolutions hashtag#SupplyChain hashtag#AFR

Le attuali condizioni di mercato rallentano la tua supply chain? La nuova soluzione Wings to Australia può aiutarti a contenere i tempi, con regolarità.Per saperne di più: https://lnkd.in/dtpPuyuthashtag#DHL hashtag#DHLGlobalForwarding hashtag#Logistics hashtag#Transportation hashtag#AirFreightSolutions hashtag#SupplyChain hashtag#AFR

Top 25 air forwarders: DHL leads the pack in a tough yearhttps://lnkd.in/dRaqbknDHL Kuehne+Nagel DB Schenker hashtag#aircargo hashtag#airfreight hashtag#logistics hashtag#supplychains

Today, our hashtag#recognition and hashtag#appreciation post goes to DHL Global Forwarding Italy. DGF Italy is working at full speed to support our customers' operations despite the impact caused by COVID-19 outbreak in Italy and around the world. Our customer service teams are at your service to provide support and discuss solutions to logistics challenges caused by the COVID-19 outbreak. Enjoy this video created by our colleagues in Italy that sends a strong message: We are one force, we are together, and we Do Go Forward. Rimani forte, Italia! hashtag#FiredUp hashtag#DHLGlobalForwarding hashtag#DGFItaly, hashtag#Italy hashtag#Logistics hashtag#OneForceTogether
